oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Secretary Patterson speaks at Army-Navy "E" Award banquet
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Men are seated in a row at a table. One man stands at a podium.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Army-Navy "E" Award; Awards; Interiors
Groves, Leslie R., 1896-1970; Patterson, Robert Porter, 1891-1952
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Army-Navy "E" award was given to corporations for excellence in war production. General Groves is on Secretary Patterson's right.
